column2: pt <- ggplot(philly_value, aes(x = year, y = estimate, group = 1)) +
geom_ribbon(aes(ymax = max, ymin = min), fill = "navy", alpha = 0.3) +
# geom_text(data = philly_value %>% filter(year >= 2009), label = estimate, nudge_y = 15, size = 2) +
labs(y ="dollars", x = NULL, title = "Median Income of Philadelphia", caption = "Shaded region represents the margin of error") +
